timeline.bodyText: Any particular reason for the double level of defaults? Just set 5 here?
timeline.author: bratseth
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -48,6 +48,9 @@ numJrtTransportThreads int default=8
 # Number of JRT connections per backend node
 numJrtConnectionsPerNode int default=8
 
+# Number of seconds to spend warming up code to prevent JIT cold start issues.
+warmuptime double default=0.1

replies.bodyText: Intention to avoid long unit test runtime.
replies.author: baldersheim

timeline.message: Let the implementation decide what kind of warmup is needed.
